message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but $150 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $225. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $225 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $175 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but $175 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm offering it to you for $200. Let's see if we can meet in the middle this time.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $180 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering it to you for $195. This is my best price, so let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $195 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $185 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm getting a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm offering it to you for $192.50. This is my absolute best price, so I hope you can meet me here.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $192.50 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $190 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me here?
